subject: Baseball
Mergers, Acquisitions and Divestitures
lead_paragraph: Ray Bartoszek, a wealthy oil trader and passionate Mets fan from Pelham, N.Y., was a runner-up in the bidding for a minority share of the team.
snippet: Ray Bartoszek, a wealthy oil trader and passionate Mets fan from Pelham, N.Y., was a runner-up in the bidding for a minority share of the team.
